description:
This handy tool safely vents and punctures LPG fuel canisters so you can toss them in the recycling bin. Once punctured, they are accepted in most municipal recycling programs.

  • Made of stainless steel
  • Conveniently clips onto a carabiner or key ring
  • Doubles as a bottle opener
  • Dimensions are 7 x 3cm
  • Note: please confirm your municipal recycling regulations as they vary from place to place
name: Jetboil CrunchIt Fuel Canister Recycling Tool
